strategy: Baran Siegemaster armies have a Strategy Rating of 1.
Initiative: All formations have a Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Baran Siegemasters

sections.name: Core Company Formations
sections.description: One Siegemaster Regimental HQ must be taken.

formations.name: 1 Siegemaster Regimental HQ
formations.units: One Baran Siegemaster with a Commissar, nine Siege Infantry

formations.name: Siege Company
formations.units: One Baran Commander with a Commissar, nine Siege Infantry

sections.name: Baran Support Formations
sections.description: Up to two Support Formations for each Core Company.

formations.name: Heavy Tank Emplacement
formations.units: Six Ragnarok Heavy Tanks, six Gun Emplacements
extraUnits: Add a Commissar and two Malcadors or Malcador Annihilators: 200 points

formations.name: Macharius Company
formations.units: One Macharius Command with a Commissar, two Macharius

formations.name: Sapper Company
formations.units: One Commissar, eight Sappers, one Hades Breaching Drill

formations.name: Siege Artillery Emplacement
formations.units: Three Bombards and three Gun Emplacements or four Medusa and four Gun Emplacements

formations.name: Super-Heavy Platoon
extraUnits: Replace a Baneblade or Stormsword with a Shadowsword: 25 points

formations.name: Howitzer Emplacement
extraUnits: Add a Commissar, three Howitzers, three Gun Emplacements: 175 points

formations.name: Flak Emplacement
formations.units: Four Heavy AA Guns, four Gun Emplacements

sections.name: Imperial Navy Aircraft
sections.description: Up to a fourth of the points available may be spent on Imperial Navy formations

upgrades.title: Baran Siegemaster Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation. Max four upgrades per Company

options.description: Add one Deathstrike and a Gun Emplacement to the formation
Add three Ragnarok Heavy Tanks and three Gun Emplacements, or two Malcadors or Malcador Annihilators
